Seal Guardian Gabriel:
You must collect four Mark of Watchman from next persons:
Visit them in the certain order:
First, visit Magister Kaiena at the Ivory Tower.
Next visit High Priest Orven at the Tower of Aden.
Third, you must visit Master Kendra, she is staing in the Tower of Aden too.
Fourth, go to the Prefect Chakiris at the Hunters Village.
